title: California Regents Hear Out Pac-12 on U.C.L.A.â€™s Move to Big Ten
description: The leaders of the sprawling University of California educational system are considering whether they should halt the move by U.C.L.A.
dc:creator: Billy Witz
media:credit: Gary A. Vasquez/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: U.C.L.A., which plays some of its football games at the Rose Bowl in Pasadena, Calif., has struggled with attendance at the start of this season.
